item.description:
The reservation is FRIDAY NOV 16TH! Please change your RSVP if you can not come!

Brand new Restaurant opened Oct 25th. Upscale Bar and Grille offering "comfort Foods" is run by previous associates of Bomboleo and is already getting rave reviews. A little pricey, but worth it. Casual or dressy as you prefer. 900 Main St in Hartford - Parking is on-street, or the $8.00 lot, or $7.00 Valet.

Some highlights are the Raw Bar, Sloppy Pigs (BBQ Pork sliders), Angus filet mignon, Sea Bass T-bone, Short Ribs Pot Roast, Salmon Wellington, Gourmet mashed potatoes, signature salads, Kettle (house cooked) potato chips, and so much more.

Join me for a night of comfort food and freindly conversation at Hartford's newest restaurant next to City Steam (which I used for the street address so the system will map it).

I will be there at 7:00 in the bar for drinks and appetizers before our seating (Dinner) time of 7:00pm. The reservation is under my name "BETSY".

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: DISH (Upscale Bar & Grille) 11/16/07 FRIDAY
